PREDATOR_RATIO.description: Percentage of size difference between agents that dictates predators

EAT_DIST.description: Distance at which Agents can eat others

HEIGHT.description: The Y value of the environment grid

WIDTH.description: The X value of the environment grid

REPRODUCTION_MOD.description: Percent of daily energy expended needed to reproduce

SPEED.description: Distance traveled in one step of initial cohort

SENSE.description: Sense of initial cohort (radius of detecting other objects)

SPEED_MOD.description: Percentage increase/decrease of speed on mutation

SIZE_MOD.description: Percentage increase/decrease of size on mutation

SENSE_MOD.description: Percentage increase/decrease of sense on mutation
